screens.typography_notes: The template uses a clean sans-serif font, likely Open Sans or a similar font, with varying font sizes for headings and body text.
screens.primary_purpose: To showcase the Chroma Modern SaaS Website Template and its features.
screens.enterprise_os_potential: This template could be reused for other SaaS products or marketing websites, potentially with modifications to the color scheme and content.

screens.typography_notes: The styleguide showcases various typography styles using the Switzerland font, with different font sizes, weights, and styles.
screens.primary_purpose: To demonstrate and guide the use of typography in the UI
screens.enterprise_os_potential: This typography styleguide can be reused across various enterprise applications for consistency in branding and readability.
